title: Oil hovers near multi - month highs as Trump considers Iran strike
description:
Oil prices dipped a few cents per barrel on Friday, consolidating recent gains and holding near six-month highs on Friday, supported by nagging tensions between the U.S. and Iran.
              Brent...
